GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a single article matching the provided ID

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Serves all comments posted to a specified Article

comments.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.
comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Posts a new comment to the database, and returns it

comment.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.
comment.author: butter_bridge

reqBodyFormat.body: Um, actually I'll think you'll find that that's HANLON's razor, not Occam's

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Posts an article in the database, and returns it

article.author: butter_bridge
